titles.title: A bill to limit the duration of certain benefits afforded to former Presidents, and for other purposes.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR S10576)
Read twice and referred to the Committee on Governmental Affairs.

bill.summary: 8/5/1993--Introduced. Amends the Federal criminal code and other Federal law to limit the duration of Secret Service protection and monetary allowances for former Presidents. Repeals the mandate for office space provided by the Administrator of General Services.
